item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Katy Perry - Rock in Rio, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, 27-09-2015 [1080p59.94]
item.description:
This is a processed version of a 10+GB interlaced video. I cropped all the banter of the annoying TV presenters, then I deinterlaced the video with Avisynth (QTGMC) for a smooth 59.94fps, I added chapters for each song and I made a text file with the setlist. The audio wasn't converted. I think it's a great recording.



Setlist:
1. Roar
2. Part of Me
3. Wide Awake
4. Dark Horse
5. E.T.
6. Legendary Lovers
7. I Kissed a Girl
8. Hot n Cold
9. International Smile
10. By the Grace of God
11. The One That Got Away
12. (Thinking of You)
13. Unconditionally
14. Walking on Air
15. This Is How We Do / Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.)
16. Teenage Dream
17. California Gurls
18. Firework

Thinking of You wasn't broadcasted.
